Question Text: The candidates for U.S. Senate are Democrat Jason Kander and Republican Roy Blunt. If the election were today, who would you vote for?

If the election for U.S. Senate was today, would you vote for Roy Blunt the Republican, Jason Kander the Democrat, or Jonathan Dine the Libertarian?  [IF UNDECIDED: If you had to vote for one of the following candidates at this moment, who do you lean toward – Roy Blunt or Jason Kander?
If the 2016 general election for Missouri’s U.S. Senate seat were held today, for whom would you vote if the candidates were Jason Kander the Democrat, and Roy Blunt, the Republican?
If the candidates for Senate this fall were Republican Roy Blunt and Democrat Jason Kander, who would you vote for?
